meanings.definition: Any one out of an indefinite number of possibilities.
meanings.sent1: I couldn't decide whichsoever to choose from the many options.
meanings.sent2: The teacher asked the students to pick whichsoever book they wanted to read.
meanings.sent3: The cat sat in front of the fish tank, pondering whichsoever fish to catch first.
meanings.sent4: The garden was filled with flowers of every color, whichsoever was the most beautiful.
meanings.sent5: In the treasure chest, there were jewels of all kinds, but whichsoever was the most valuable?

meanings.definition: Whichever one out of an indefinite number of possibilities.
meanings.sent1: You can choose whichsoever you like best from the menu.
meanings.sent2: Whichsoever of the cupcakes you pick, I'm sure it will be delicious.
meanings.sent3: The magician waved his wand, saying 'whichsoever of these hats will hide the rabbit?'
meanings.sent4: Among the stars in the sky, whichsoever shines the brightest?
meanings.sent5: The treasure map led to three different islands; whichsoever holds the hidden chest?
